dtliExcerpt: Victoria Clark gives a touching, beautifully nuanced performance as a teenager trapped in the body of a woman with a rare aging disease in this tender musical adaptation.
bwwExcerpt: Tony-winner Victoria Clark stars as a teenage girl with a genetic disorder that causes her to age rapidly in a wondrous new musical by David Lindsay-Abaire and Jeanine Tesori.
